node.title: The Most Dependable Time Prophecy
node.description: Why were the Millerites so confident that Jesus was going to return in 1844? In this message Pastor Clark explores the key to understanding the time prophecy of Daniel chapter eight – and how the way God chose to combine prophecies of both the first and second advents makes this time prophecy the most certain, sure, and reliable interpretation of any time prophecy in the Bible!
